channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- HPE Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays; Nimble Storage Secondary Flash Arrays
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- HPE Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays; Nimble Storage Secondary Flash Arrays

item.title: CVE-2022-37929|2024-08-03T10:37:42.569Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- hpe%20nimble%20storage%20hybrid%20flash%20arrays%3B%20nimble%20storage%20secondary%20flash%20arrays
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Hewlett Packard Enterprise Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays and Nimble Storage Secondary Flash Arrays.

item.title: CVE-2022-37928|2024-08-03T10:37:42.573Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- hpe%20nimble%20storage%20hybrid%20flash%20arrays%3B%20nimble%20storage%20secondary%20flash%20arrays
item.description: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity vulnerability in Hewlett Packard Enterprise HPE Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays and Nimble Storage Secondary Flash Arrays.

item.title: CVE-2022-37930|2024-08-03T10:37:42.525Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- hpe%20nimble%20storage%20hybrid%20flash%20arrays%3B%20nimble%20storage%20secondary%20flash%20arrays
item.description: A security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Nimble Storage Hybrid Flash Arrays and HPE Nimble Storage Secondary Flash Arrays which could potentially allow local disclosure of sensitive information.
